resp = client.ingest.put_pipeline(
    id="set_os",
    description="sets the value of host.os.name from the field os",
    processors=[
        {
            "set": {
                "field": "host.os.name",
                "value": "{{{os}}}"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.ingest.simulate(
    id="set_os",
    docs=[
        {
            "_source": {
                "os": "Ubuntu"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)
